2.name: Professional/Formal (Job Application)
2.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,
I hope this email finds you well.
I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position at [Company Name], as advertised on [Job Board/Website]. With my background in Python development and my experience building data-driven applications, I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to your team.
Attached is my resume for your review. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills align with the goals of [Company Name].
Thank you for your time and consideration.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Your Phone Number]
